long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension to add features to the search in page feature using ctrl+shift+f
(similar to vscode)

Features:
- Match Case
- Match Whole Word
- Regex Search
- Search in Selection
- Dark Theme (Accessible via options)

How to use:
On any web page, pop up our search box using ctrl+shift+f to be able to search in the page using our additionnal features. Access the options page to activate the dark mode.

https://github.com/LeafApps/search-but-better/tree/v1.0.1
